title: Andrew Garfield’s latest interview is proof that he’s the world’s most supportive ex-boyfriend
text:
Andrew Garfield’s latest interview is proof that he’s the world’s most supportive ex-boyfriend Have you made your breakup goals for 2017 yet? Let Andrew Garfield and Emma Stone be your inspiration. They may have split over a year ago , but Garfield has no problem gushing about his pride for his ex. On Vanity Fair ‘s Little Gold Men podcast, he expressed his excitement over her recent career successes .
“We care about each other so much, and that’s a given, that’s kind of this unconditional thing,” he said, while promoting his film Hacksaw Ridge .
Watching Emma Stone own the awards season with her performance in La La Land causes Andrew Garfield nothing but joy. On the latest #LittleGoldMen podcast, Andrew Garfield opens up about his relationship with Emma Stone saying, "I'm her biggest fan." Listen to the full episode on @VFHWD at the link in bio. 
A video posted by Vanity Fair (@vanityfair) on Jan 12, 2017 at 8:05am PST 
In fact, Garfield gave his ex a standing ovation as she received her first Golden Globe award on Sunday. Andrew Garfield gave Emma Stone a standing ovation so i'm holding on to some hope pic.twitter.com/wo014wAUu2 
— lauren yap (@itslaurenyap) January 9, 2017 “There’s so much love between us and so much respect,” Andrew said. “I’m her biggest fan as an artist. So for me, it’s been bliss to be able to watch her success and watch her bloom into the actress that she is. And it’s also been wonderful to have that kind of support for each other. It’s nothing but a beautiful thing.”
"There’s so much love between us and so much respect."— Andrew Garfield on his ex-girlfriend Emma Stone. Tap the link in bio to read more about how these two define ex goals. #TBT : @josholins 
A photo posted by Teen Vogue (@teenvogue) on Jan 12, 2017 at 9:50am PST 
Last month, in the Hollywood Reporter ‘s Actors’ Roundtable, Andrew was asked who he’d bring with him if he were stranded on a desert island . His answer was instantaneous: “Emma Stone. I love Emma.”
And we love the shining example of ex-bf that you are setting for men everywhere, Garfield. Keep it up. ❤️
